001package game;
002import java.util.HashMap;
003/**
004 * Room class - a room in an adventure game.
005 *
006 * @author Christophe TARATIBU
007 */
008public class Room
009{
010    private final String aDescription;
011    private final HashMap<String, Room> aExits; // les sorties de cette piece
012    private final HashMap<String, Room> aTrapDoors; // les trap doors unidirectionnelles
013    private final String aImageName;
014    private ItemList aRoomListItems;
015    private final String aRoomName;
016
017    /**
018     * Initialization of a room
019     * @param pDescription Room's description
020     * @param pImageName An image used to show the room
021     */
022    public Room(final String pDescription, final String pImageName, final String pRoomName){
023        this.aDescription = pDescription;  
024        this.aExits = new HashMap<String, Room>();
025        this.aTrapDoors = new HashMap<String, Room>();
026        this.aRoomListItems = new ItemList();
027        this.aImageName = pImageName;
028        this.aRoomName = pRoomName;
029    }
030    
031    /**
032     * Gives the description of the room and possible exits.
033     * @return The description of the room and exits.
034     */
035    public String getDescription(){
036        return this.aDescription;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Gives a long description of this room
041     * @return Description of the room with exits
042     */
043    public String getLongDescription(){
044        String vDescription = "You are " + this.aDescription + ".\n" + this.getExitString();
045        vDescription += " " + this.aRoomListItems.showItem();
046        return vDescription;
047        
048    }
049    
050    /**
051     * Gives the name of the room
052     * @return The name of the room
053     */
054    public String getRoomName(){
055        return this.aRoomName;
056    }
057    /**
058     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
059     * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
060     * @return The room in the given direction.
061     */
062    public Room getExit(String pDirection){
063        Room vExit = this.aExits.get(pDirection);
064        if(vExit == null){
065            vExit = this.aTrapDoors.get(pDirection);
066        }
067        return vExit;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Gives a string of all exits of the room.
072     * @return A string of all exits of the room.
073     */
074    public String getExitString(){
075        StringBuilder vReturnString = new StringBuilder(" Exits:");
076        for (String vDirection : this.aExits.keySet() ) {
077            vReturnString.append( " " + vDirection );
078        }
079        for (String vDirection : this.aTrapDoors.keySet() ) {
080            vReturnString.append( " " + vDirection );
081        }
082        return vReturnString.toString();
083    }
084
085    
086    /**
087     * Add an item in the room
088     * @param pName Name of the item
089     * @param pItem Item
090     */
091    public void addItem(final String pName, final Item pItem){
092        this.aRoomListItems.addItem(pName, pItem);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Get the item in the room
097     * @param pName Name of the item    
098     * @return The item in the room
099     */
100    public Item getItem(final String pName){
101        Item vItem = this.aRoomListItems.getItem(pName);
102        //System.out.println(vItem.getItemName());
103        return vItem;
104    }
105
106
107    /**
108     * Define an exit for the room
109     * @param pDirection Direction of the exit
110     * @param pNeighbor Room in the given direction
111     */
112    public void setExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor){
113        this.aExits.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * Define a one-way trap door exit for the room
118     * @param pDirection Direction of the exit
119     * @param pNeighbor Room in the given direction
120     */
121    public void setTrapDoorExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor){
122        this.aTrapDoors.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Remove an item from the room
127     * @param pName Name of the item
128     */
129    public void removeItem(final String pName){
130        this.aRoomListItems.removeItem(pName);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Return a string describing the room's image name.
135     * @return The image name of the room.
136     */
137    public String getImageName(){
138       return this.aImageName;
139    }
140
141    /**
142     * Get all item names present in this room
143     * @return array of item names
144     */
145    public String[] getItemNames(){
146        return this.aRoomListItems.getItemNames();
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Whether the room currently has no items
151     * @return true if no items
152     */
153    public boolean hasNoItems(){
154        return this.aRoomListItems.isEmpty();
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Check if a room is an exit from this room
159     * @param pRoom Room to check
160     * @return true if the room is an exit
161     */
162    public boolean isExit(final Room pRoom){
163        return this.aTrapDoors.containsValue(pRoom);
164    }
165}
